mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER(ID, PWD, STUDNO, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, UUID, GRADE, LOANSCNT) VALUES (#{id}, #{pwd}, #{studNo}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{uuid}, 1, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET PWD = #{pwd}, NICKNAME = #{nickName}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, UUID = #{uuid} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TBL_MEMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_AUTH USING(ID) WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT ID, PWD, STUDNO, NAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, UUID, GRADE, LOANSCNT FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET LOANSCNT = LOANSCNT + #{loansCnt} WHERE ID = #{id}
